1001010011001011 0001101011101100 1 -> sum: 1010111110111000, cout: 0
0100001000010110 1010011111010001 1 -> sum: 1110100111101000, cout: 0
1110011010011101 0101010110111100 0 -> sum: 0011110001011001, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
